0111000101000101 1011001101111011 1 -> sum: 0010010011000001, cout: 1

0010001010001110 0011110101001110 1 -> sum: 0101111111011101, cout: 0
0010100000101101 0110000110110110 1 -> sum: 1000100111100100, cout: 0
0010001110101000 0001001110100011 0 -> sum: 0011011101001011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
